message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This price still allows me to get a fair return on the product while giving you a good deal. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,250. I think this is a fair compromise.
